resources.string: Green, orange, puple, and yellow were the original 4 colors of "The Ten" collaboration
The original Nike Uptempo\'s were released in 2015
The Yeezy 350 boost originally sold at $320 retail
The original color wave of Human Racers were yellow and black
The SUpreme x Nike Dunks came out in 6 color waves
When OffWhite did their original collab with Nike, they released 10 types of shoes
